provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1.   This Act may be cited as the Financial Institutions Short title and
(Amendment) Act, 2002, and shall be read and construed as one construction.
with the Financial Institutions Act (hereinafter referred to as the
principal Act) and all amendments thereto.
